医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究强调在应对大流行病时需要整合政策、行为改变和风险沟通研究人员测量了传染数之间的关联，传染数是每周实时测量严重急性呼吸综合征冠状病毒 2 的指标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Study-highlights-need-for-integration-of-policy-behavior-change-and-risk-communication-in-pandemic-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Study-highlights-need-for-integration-of-policy-behavior-change-and-risk-communication-in-pandemic-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef0bcc66-7161-4ce6-8754-c105a6b0d605 Thu, 27 Jul 2023 08:05:00 -0400 Study highlights need for integration of policy, behavior change, and risk communication in pandemic response
温馨家园停车场：部分医院欢迎患者、家属、工作人员房车居住吉姆·韦弗（Jim Weaver）在过去十年中进行了两次大型手术：一次是切除膀胱中的癌性肿瘤，另一次是疏通阻塞的动脉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Home-sweet-parking-lot-Some-hospitals-welcome-RV-living-for-病人-families-and-workers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Home-sweet-parking-lot-Some-hospitals-welcome-RV-living-for-病人-families-and-workers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb371f96-016a-4c6f-a80d-36c789a450aa Thu, 27 Jul 2023 06:50:02 -0400 Home sweet parking lot: Some hospitals welcome RV living for patients, families, and workers
民主党议员赢得州长纽瑟姆的资助后，覆盖加州以削减患者费用民主党议员迫使州长加文·纽瑟姆兑现四年来的承诺，即利用对未参保者罚款的税收处罚收益来增加对低收入和中等收入加州人的医疗保险补贴，几周后，全覆盖加州官员宣布，他们将集中资金这笔钱用于减少许多因护理费用而苦苦挣扎的参保者的自付费用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Covered-California-to-cut- Patient-costs-after-Democratic-lawmakers-win-funding-from-Gov-Newsom.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Covered-California-to-cut- Patient-costs-after-Democratic-lawmakers-win-funding-from-Gov-Newsom.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=12138c57-711d-475b-930f-813dcb42a145 Thu, 27 Jul 2023 06:43:18 -0400 Covered California to cut patient costs after Democratic lawmakers win funding from Gov. Newsom
血管舒缩反应性在 COVID-19 患者中的作用研究人员检索并整理了有关 COVID-19 患者脑血流动力学变化的最相关的已发表文献。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/The-role-of-vasomotor-reactivity-in-COVID-19-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/The-role-of-vasomotor-reactivity-in-COVID-19-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78c9d68f-be6c-40d9-b8e3-42d4eef25aa0 Thu, 27 Jul 2023 06:43:00 -0400 The role of vasomotor reactivity in COVID-19 patients
华大智造如何利用测序技术促进农业基因组学和食品可持续性：澳大利亚案例研究最近在罗马举行的联合国粮食系统+2盘点时刻之后，对全球粮食安全的关注从未如此重要。应对人口激增和气候变化的挑战需要创新的解决方案，而农业基因组学是一个显示出巨大前景的领域。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/How-MGI-Boosts-Agrigenomics-and-Food-Sustainability-with-Sequencing-Technology-An-Australian-Case-Study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/How-MGI-Boosts-Agrigenomics-and-Food-Sustainability-with-Sequencing-Technology-An-Australian-Case-Study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b0bbabd-e8e4-4f8d-8717-804df7b64304 Thu, 27 Jul 2023 04:45:00 -0400 How MGI Boosts Agrigenomics and Food Sustainability with Sequencing Technology: An Australian Case Study
从头测序、QTL 作图、WGS 和 lcWGS 如何实现农业基因组学的突破测序技术在农业领域发挥着越来越重要的作用，包括农作物、畜禽、水生生物等。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/How-do-De-novo-sequencing-QTL-mapping-WGS-and-lcWGS-empower-breakthroughs-in-agrigenomics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/How-do-De-novo-sequencing-QTL-mapping-WGS-and-lcWGS-empower-breakthroughs-in-agrigenomics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6cad08eb-59a5-4121-ae2a-ac931e2e8e5b Thu, 27 Jul 2023 04:31:00 -0400 How do De novo sequencing, QTL mapping, WGS, and lcWGS empower breakthroughs in agrigenomics
如果学生有社会关怀历史，他们更有可能被排除在外伦敦大学学院研究人员的一项新研究发现，如果英格兰公立中学的学生有接受过社会关怀或特殊教育需求服务的历史，他们更有可能被排除在外。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Pupils-in-schools-are-much-more-likely-to-be-excluded-if-they-have-a-history-of-social-护理.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Pupils-in-schools-are-much-more-likely-to-be-excluded-if-they-have-a-history-of-social- care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=52bc97ff-5b9b-47c4-a551-a19e9cb852c9 Thu, 27 Jul 2023 00:52:34 -0400 Pupils in schools are much more likely to be excluded if they have a history of social care
普遍基因检测可以改善罕见和致命癌症的风险分层和治疗食管腺癌 (EAC) 是一种高度致命的癌症，五年生存率低于 20%。尽管大约 7% 的中年成年人存在一种称为 Barrett 食管 (BE) 的 EAC 前兆病变，但只有不到 1% 的 BE 患者会进展为 EAC，因此很难确定哪些人有发生 EAC 的风险这种致命的癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Universal-genic-testing-may-improve-risk-stratification-and-treatment-for-rare-and-lethal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Universal-genic-testing-may-improve-risk-stratification-and-treatment-for-rare-and-lethal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a67c6a7-7c89-4e2a-8b1c-bf1ef441a423 Thu, 27 Jul 2023 00:39:50 -0400 Universal genetic testing may improve risk stratification and treatment for rare and lethal cancer
研究显示，跨性别儿童需要性别肯定护理一项新的研究显示，由于 2021 年以来 20 个州通过的法律和其他行动，许多需要性别肯定护理的跨性别儿童的家庭将需要比以前走得更远。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Gender-affirming-care-required-for-transgender-children-shows-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Gender-affirming-care-required-for-transgender-children-shows-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=846af4ba-5e3c-4a70-b4be-f6fba40ff50a Thu, 27 Jul 2023 00:27:47 -0400 Gender-affirming care required for transgender children, shows study
筛查无法解决黑色素瘤存活率的种族差异：研究根据 UPMC 和匹兹堡大学研究人员的一项新的 JAMA 皮肤病学研究，增加对有色皮肤个体的皮肤癌筛查不足以解决黑色素瘤存活率的种族差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Screening-wont-address-racial-disparities-in-melanoma-survival-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Screening-wont-address-racial-disparities-in-melanoma-survival-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da082401-3050-4024-a724-9f8aafa47fa9 Thu, 27 Jul 2023 00:17:00 -0400 Screening will not address racial disparities in melanoma survival rates: Study
